original_text: Everyone should respect leaders of the believers who lead the church well. The church should also pay them properly for their work. That is certainly true for leaders who teach God's people and speak God's message to them.
korean_text: 잘 다스리는 장로들은 배나 존경할 자로 알되 말씀과 가르침에 수고하는 이들에게는 더욱 그리할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: of the believers who lead the church well
The church should also pay them properly
sentences.korean_translation: 교회는 또한 그들에게 적절하게 보상해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: That is certainly true for leaders
and speak God's message to them
